KitKat::

She looked at him and puches his hand away. "I know how war works. I 
have been in many."  She turned away from him. "Don't get to close 
there my hard hitting friend. War is what makes a Predacon who they 
are. It's what keeps the pain in your spark so close that your anger 
is your driving force. And it's what keeps me alive."  She turned to 
him with rage in her optics, but spoke in a tolerant tone. "Let me 
out of here."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw: It's simple, there is no quick plan that will wipe them 
out in one strike. Never going to happen like that. This is a war and 
it will take time.
> He moves closer, touching her jaw.
> SharpClaw: I'm sorry if there is any lasting pain. I had to make 
sure I knocked you out.
>
